name: Blinky's Adventure TWO!!!!
description:
After a lot of contemplating, I do believe that Blinky's Adventure has grown quite old, probably has a bit of mold at that. So in with the new and out with the old ya know? Time for Blinky's Adventure 2: The sequel to the neveragame! Comes with a fresh coat of paint to the game's mid graphics to make them ten times as better (and a little bit more retro), but also comes with actual music and sfx for a blinky game! Holy cow! This is merely a demo though, there may be more to come in the future..

Controls -

Arrow keys - move

Z - Jump

Shift - Run

Trailer -
